title: Summoners' Society League of Legends OCE (Community & Facebook Group)

replies.body:
We have milk and cookies! Join us! 

Wait... Lulu just ate all the cookies... And Annie just drank all the milk... 

Where's Alistar?! We need more milk!
I don't know about you Kaiju, but I really don't want to be anywhere near an Alistar when it is being milked. I'll stick with a big cake.. I think Fiddlesticks has one lying around..
